item.title: Remove pls
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ykcud:

How about listing features. Is it a pay to win or vote to win? What xp rate is the server? Is there anything this server has that many others don’t? Is it a pk, economy, ect? Is it an remake of any kind? Just examples there. Also you may want to put in pictures as well. I personally don’t care for them much, but also don’t mine them, and the rest of the community seems to crave them for ads.

In his defense, battlescape was decently well known, to the point that alot of us who were pretty active back when it was around knew about it. However, it isn’t directly following the server advertisement board rules.

Read full topic
